Comments_List: Introduction to basics of proteins/amino acids. Complex metabolic pathways and interrelations treated in the second half. Focus on glycolysis and oxidative phosphorylation. Details of homeostatic regulation and transport proteins covered.

Good organization. Examples from the first half came back in the second half so we were already familiar with the information. Well done.

This class moves at a snails pace. Could basically cut the first 1/3rd of the course.
Yes. I think the second half of the course was interesting. However, the student should be prepared for a bit of boredom at the front end. Low workload class.
